title: Photographs
description: Passport size photographs of the applicant and co-applicant (if any).

title: Identity Proof
description:
Any one of the following:
Passport
Aadhaar
Voter ID
Driving license

title: Bank Statements
description: For the last 6 months (both applicant and co-applicant).

title: Residence Proof
description:
Any one of the following:
Passport
Aadhaar
Voter ID
Driving license

title: Guarantor Form
description: If required, duly filled and signed.

title: Academic Records
description:
Mark sheets and certificates of qualifying exams.
Admission letter.

title: Income Proof
description:
For salaried individuals: Salary slips of the last 3 months, Form 16, and/or Income Tax Returns (ITR)
For self-employed individuals: ITR, Profit & Loss account, Balance Sheet, and/or Business Proof

title: Property Documents
description: If applicable as collateral, documents related to the property being pledged.
